Place Self

# Place Self

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                      | Support     |
| -------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
place-self-auto
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-self-start
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-self-end
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-self-center
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-self-stretch
``` | 🌐 Web only |
